headline: International Flavors Q4 Earnings Miss Estimates, Sales Dip Y/Y
summary: IFF's Q4 earnings miss estimates as sales fall 6.6% y/y, but currency-neutral growth and segment gains hint at mixed momentum heading into 2026.

raw.headline: International Flavors Q4 Earnings Miss Estimates, Sales Dip Y/Y
raw.summary: IFF's Q4 earnings miss estimates as sales fall 6.6% y/y, but currency-neutral growth and segment gains hint at mixed momentum heading into 2026.

headline: Mizuho Maintains Outperform on PPG Indus, Raises Price Target to $140
summary: Mizuho  analyst John Roberts   maintains PPG Indus (NYSE:PPG) with a Outperform and raises the price target from $125 to $140.
